title: What is Engineering Conference?
description: It is a 3-day conference which provides engineering students a hands-on experience to solve contemporary problems through education, collaboration, and debate while investing in sustainable solutions.

title: Are there any participation fees?
description: Engineering Conference 2019 participation fee is $25 per participant for all three days. UCI Engineering Conference is a non-profit event for which all proceeds go to funding under-resourced community development programs. Food, performances, and training sessions are provided in all three days.

title: How can I register?
description: Registration for Engineering Conference 2019 is no longer available.

title: Where will the Engineering Conference be located?
description: All three days of Engineering Conference will be located in a local Hotel, The Double Tree by Hilton on, 201 E MacArthur Blvd Santa Anna, CA 92707.

title: Is the conference restricted to student of a specific grade and major?
description: Not at all, we are glad to welcome all undergraduate UCI students.
